papers.title: Database Technologies and Applications
authors: This contribution will give an overview of current database systems and their main application areas. The presentation will start with a brief introduction describing the key implementation technologies and different applications areas of traditional relational database systems. The talk will then cover more recent developments in the area of extremely large databases

in-memory databases and several “no-SQL” systems to point out their respective advantages for specific problem areas. The presentation will conclude with an outlook on upcoming technology changes in the database and storage area
outlining their possible impact on science database applications.
